preAuthSteps.header:
Setup Stampedio Integration
Refer to our documention for setup instructions

attributes.label: Fill in the below details to establish connection between Stampedio and Warehouse for data replication
Integration Name
attributes.name: integrationName
attributes.help: Enter the integration name. Daton will use this name to create tables in the warehouse. Once selected, this name cannot be changed.

attributes.label: Frequency
attributes.name: frequency
attributes.help: Select the frequency in hours with which you'd like Daton to pull data from this source.

attributes.label: History
attributes.name: history
attributes.help: Select the number of years of historical data you'd like Daton to pull into your data warehouse.

attributes.label: Enter Stampedio api public key here
attributes.name: client_id

attributes.label: Enter Stampedio api private key here
attributes.name: client_secret

postAuthSteps.header:
Setup Stampedio Integration
Configure tables & fields
